about_the_game:
Prepare to unravel the mysteries of Anomaly Company!

CAN YOU AND YOUR TEAM FIGURE OUT WHATS OUT OF THE ORDINARY?

In Anomaly Company you and co-players have to try and escape by noticing Anomalies and making the decision to vote wether an anomaly is active or not. If you have decided correctly you progress to the next level. Otherwise you are reset to the first level. Will you ever escape...?

  • 1-4 player online co-op
    Explore a multiplayer experience with up to 4 players. Communicate and help each other through text chat or proximity voice chat

  • Get to the exit
    Navigating through the levels, some more mysterious than others, you'll encounter anomalies that defy logic and reason. Keep your senses sharp as you search for hidden clues and spot anomalies to get closer towards escaping at Level 10

MORE FEATURES:

  • 1-4 player online co-op

  • Replayability

  • Socialize with friends or strangers

  • Chat & Voicechat

  • Immerse yourself in atmospheric environments

  • Puzzles

  • Get frightened, jumpscares

  • Finding anomalies

Prepare to unravel the mysteries of Anomaly Company. Can you escape, or will you become lost forever? It's up to you, but remember, not everything is as it seems...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May work with even lower specs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May work with even lower specs

short_description: Anomaly Company is a scary realistic co-op anomaly game for up to 4 players. You are set in realistic environments where unexplainable events will start to happen. Will you be able to escape?
